metadata.title: CVE-2019-17534 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
vips_foreign_load_gif_scan_image in foreign/gifload.c in libvips before 8.8.2 tries to access a color map before a DGifGetImageDesc call, leading to a use-after-free.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-17534` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-vips-8.0 - 8.8.3-3
libvips-tools - 8.8.3-3
libvips42 - 8.8.3-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vips package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.8.3-3').
